amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account (for advanced manufacturing) by $245 million and to decrease funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $245,000,000 the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability and Efficiency account and decrease the Weapons Activities account by $245,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 264 (Roll no. 313).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 264 (Roll no. 313).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Takano.
